content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationNikhil Balaji420, Bharti buildingnbalaji@cse.iitd.ac.inI am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Delhi. Before this, I was a Research Associate at the Department of Computer Science and  lecturer at Trinity College at the University of Oxford,  postdoctoral fellow at Ulm university, and the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. I obtained my Ph.D in Computer Science at the Chennai Mathematical Institute.I mainly work at the intersection of Computational Complexity Theory, Automata theory, Verification and Numerical algorithms. I enjoy thinking about computational problems from Algebra and Number theory.Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
